Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a home run in the 4th inning.
Starling Marte doubled in the 9th inning, scoring Eduardo Reyes.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sean Manaea pitched two-hit ball over seven innings.
Garrett Crochet struck out eight batters.
Others: The Mets won the series 3-0 against the White Sox.
The game took 2 hours and 18 minutes to complete.
